text: Anil Wadha; born 26 May 1957https://web.archive.org/web/20180422070724/https://mea.gov.in/writereaddata/images/Civi_List_27-7-12.pdf is an Indian diplomat who belongs to the Indian Foreign Service. He has served as the Indian Ambassador to Italy, Poland, Oman and Thailand. He is currently a Senior Fellow & Cluster Leader at the Vivekananda International Foundation in New Delhi.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214205549/http://www.vifindia.org/author/amd- anil-wadhwa ==Personal life== Wadhwa holds a Master of Arts with a specialisation in Chinese History as well as Medieval Indian history and Architecturehttp://www.business-standard.com/article/news-ians/anil-wadhwa- named-india-s-new-ambassador-to-italy-115112601356_1.html from the University of Delhi.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214215838/http://www.thailandtatler.com/tatler- list/500list/anil-wadhwa He is married to Deepa Gopalan Wadhwa, who also belongs to the Indian Foreign Service. They have two sons.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214220257/http://npo- jiipa.org/en/news/news3.html ==Career== Anil Wadhwa was a member of the Indian Foreign Service from 1 July 1979 to 31 May 2017.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214222140/http://eamunc.org/anil- wadhwa.html He has served at the Indian missions in Hong Kong, Beijing, Geneva, Warsaw,https://web.archive.org/web/20180214223324/http://www.indianembassywarsaw.in/eoi.php?id=Previous Muscat,http://www.indemb-oman.org/eoi.php?id=Officials Bangkokhttps://web.archive.org/web/20180214224233/http://www.indianembassy.in.th/pages.php?id=3 and Rome. He has served as the Director/Joint Secretary at the Technical Secretariat of the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons, The Hague from July 1993 to July 2000.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214230209/http://www.fao.org/fileadmin/user_upload/gsb/Files/Substitute_Representatives/English/INDIA_Wadhwa.pdf He was also a United Nations Disarmament Fellow at Geneva from July to November 1989.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214222140/http://eamunc.org/anil- wadhwa.html During Wadhwa's tenure as the Indian Ambassador to Italy and San Marino, he served as the Indian Permanent representative to three Rome-based agencies of the United Nations: Food and Agriculture Organization, International Fund for Agricultural Development and World Food Programme.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214222140/http://eamunc.org/anil- wadhwa.html Wadhwa has coordinated the evacuation of Indian nationals from Iraq, Yemen and Libya while serving as the Secretary (East) in the Ministry of External Affairs, India.https://web.archive.org/web/20180214222140/http://eamunc.org/anil- wadhwa.html He was also associated with the Operation Raahat.https://www.oneindia.com/india/india-evacuates-5600-from- yemen-200-indians-unwilling- leave-1712879.htmlhttp://pib.nic.in/newsite/mbErel.aspx?relid=118364http://indianexpress.com/article/india/india- others/india-to-shut-embassy-as-situation-worsens-in-strife-torn- yemen/http://www.gulf-times.com/story/434419/200-Indians-refuse-to-leave- Yemen-as-rescue-ends ==See Also== *A.
